meanings.definition: A board or frame used for carrying heavy loads on the back.
meanings.sent1: The hikers used sturdy packboards to carry their camping gear through the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The packboards were essential for transporting supplies during the expedition.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a packboard full of snacks felt like being a walking vending machine.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the packboard that carried her through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The packboards groaned under the weight of the heavy equipment.

meanings.definition: To load or carry items on a packboard.
meanings.sent1: They packboarded all their gear before setting off on the hike.
meanings.sent2: He packboards his tools to the construction site every morning.
meanings.sent3: She decided to packboard her books to school to avoid straining her arms.
meanings.sent4: The memories of their adventures packboarded them through the challenges they faced.
meanings.sent5: Packboarding the supplies made the journey more manageable for the team.
